name: Serious Heat: Habanero Turkey Chili
description: Editor's note: Gretchen VanEsselstyn of Chile Pepper Magazine, will be dropping by each week with a recipe for heat freaks. This week, though, in honor of the Super Bowl, she'll have a recipe a day right up to the big...
recipeIngredient: 1 (15-ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
1 cup frozen or canned corn, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, warm the oil, add the meat, and brown. In a slow cooker, combine meat with all other ingredients, and stir well. Cook on low heat for about 6 hours, and serve.
